R

registerMetadata(Class<? extends HasMetadata>, String, Class<T>) - Static method in class eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext.jackson.SemTextModule
Registers the provided namespace to the corresponding metadata class, so Jackson will know how to deserialize objects under that namespace.
registerMetadata(Class<? extends HasMetadata>, String, TypeReference) - Static method in class eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext.jackson.SemTextModule
Registers the provided namespace to the corresponding metadata type reference, so Jackson will know how to deserialize objects under that namespace.
registerModulesInto(ObjectMapper) - Static method in class eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext.jackson.SemTextModule
Registers in the provided object mapper the jackson semtext module and also the required odt commons and guava modules.

S

Exception for problems occurring during SemText metadata deserialization.
